repositories.author: portcullislabs
repositories.name: enum4linux
repositories.description: enum4Linux is a Linux alternative to enum.exe for enumerating data from Windows and Samba hosts.

repositories.author: jimsalterjrs
repositories.name: sanoid
repositories.description: Policy-driven snapshot management and replication tools. Using ZFS for underlying next-gen storage. (Btrfs support plans are shelved unless and until btrfs becomes reliable.) Primarily intended for Linux, but BSD use is supported and reasonably frequently tested.

repositories.author: m8r0wn
repositories.name: pymeta
repositories.description: Pymeta will search the web for files on a domain to download and extract metadata. This technique can be used to identify: domains, usernames, software/version numbers and naming conventions.
